snippet.title: Landflix Odyssey - Announcement trailer | Nintendo Switch | Playstation | Xbox | Steam
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/794850/Landflix_Odyssey/

After a long period of development, the streaming platform parody game is finally available!
Landflix Odyssey is an action - platformer in which players play as Larry, a lazy binge-watcher who, after using special batteries, finds himself trapped inside the streaming service he was watching, Landflix !
